Bearer.description:
For accessing the API a valid JWT token must be passed in all the queries in
the 'Authorization' header.

A valid JWT token is generated by the API and returned.

The following syntax must be used in the 'Authorization' header :
    Bearer xxxxxx.yyyyyyy.zzzzzz
Bearer.name: Authorization

KGAuth.description:
API endpoints called by the KG application are authenticated by a valid JWT
token which must contain the correct project resources which is needed.
The token must be passed in the 'X-CPS-KG-Authorization' header.

A valid JWT token can be obtained by the CPS API or UI.

The following syntax must be used in the 'Authorization' header :
    KGToken xxxxxx.yyyyyyy.zzzzzz
KGAuth.name: X-CPS-KG-Authorization

ManagementKey.description:
For accessing the API using a valid management token, it must be passed in all the queries in
the 'Authorization' header.
ManagementKey.name: Authorization
